title: Admin Management
subtitle: Manage admin permissions and status in the system
createNewAdmin: Start by creating a new sub admin.

createModal.title: Create New Deputy Admin
createModal.name: Full Name
createModal.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

confirmDialog.changeStatusMessage: Are you sure you want to change the status of admin "{{name}}"?
confirmDialog.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete admin "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

view.label: View User Info
view.description: View user list and basic information

view_detail.label: View User Detail
view_detail.description: Allow opening user detail modal in Users list

view_active_accounts.label: View Active Accounts
view_active_accounts.description: View the list of currently active accounts

delete_permanently.label: Permanently Delete Account
delete_permanently.description: Permanently remove a user account from the system

activity.label: View User Activity
activity.description: Access User Activity page to view detailed user activities

recall.label: Recall messages (DM)
recall.description: Allow recalling 1-1 messages in real time

delete.label: Delete messages (DM)
delete.description: Allow deleting 1-1 messages in real time (delete for one side or both)

groups.label: Groups Tab
groups.description: View and manage groups that user participates in

recall.label: Recall group messages
recall.description: Allow recalling messages in group chats in real time

delete.label: Delete group messages
delete.description: Allow deleting messages in group chats in real time

delete.label: Delete notifications
delete.description: Allow deleting user's notifications in real time

clear_all.label: Clear all notifications
clear_all.description: Allow clearing all notifications for the user (Super Admin or granted admins only)

message_status.label: Track Message Status
message_status.description: View message sent, delivered, read status in real-time

delivered.label: Delivered Status
delivered.description: Track when messages are received by recipient

read.label: Read Status
read.description: Track when messages are read by recipient

sessions.label: Manage Login Devices
sessions.description: Manage user login sessions and devices

view.label: View Login Devices
view.description: View list of active login devices

logout.label: Logout Specific Device
logout.description: Logout user from a specific device

chat_settings.label: Manage Chat Settings
chat_settings.description: Manage user chat settings (E2EE, Read Status, Privacy)

toggle.label: Toggle E2EE
toggle.description: Allow enabling or disabling E2EE for user

toggle.label: Toggle Read Status
toggle.description: Allow enabling or disabling read status display

allow_non_friends.label: Messages from non-friends
allow_non_friends.description: Allow or disallow messages from non-friends

view_detail.label: View Note Details
view_detail.description: View detailed note information via modal when clicking on list

shared.label: Manage Shared Notes
shared.description: Manage shared notes in the system

view.label: View Shared Notes
view.description: View shared notes list and details

edit.label: Edit Shared Notes
edit.description: Edit permissions and messages of shared notes

delete.label: Delete Shared Notes
delete.description: Delete shared notes and related messages

view_detail.label: View Folder Details
view_detail.description: View folder details and notes inside when clicking on folder

view_detail.label: View Folder Details
view_detail.description: View folder details and notes inside when clicking on folder

edit.label: Edit Folders
edit.description: Edit folder name, color, and icon

move.label: Move note to folder
move.description: Move notes from Active/Archived tabs to folders

create.label: Create note in folder
create.description: Create a new note in the folder

edit.label: Edit note in folder
edit.description: Edit a note inside the folder

delete.label: Delete note in folder
delete.description: Delete a note inside the folder

remove.label: Move note out of folder
remove.description: Move a note from the folder to the Active tab

edit.label: Edit Category
edit.description: Edit category name, color, and icon

view_detail.label: View Tag Details
view_detail.description: View tag details and list of notes with this tag when clicking on a tag

delete.label: Delete Tag
delete.description: Delete tag (tag will be removed from all notes)

assign.label: Assign/Remove Tags from Notes
assign.description: Assign or remove tags from notes

manage_admins.label: Manage Admins
manage_admins.description: Manage other admin accounts (Super Admin only)

self.label: Own profile
self.description: Permissions for accessing and editing your own profile

view.label: View own profile
view.description: Allow sub admin to access their own profile page

edit.label: Edit own profile
edit.description: Allow sub admin to edit their own profile

name: Full Name
